subject: English
tips: 📚 Break study into smaller, manageable sessions. Focus on one grammar rule at a time to avoid feeling overwhelmed.
💡 Take regular breaks to keep your mind fresh. A short walk or a quick stretch can boost your concentration.
📝 Use active recall and spaced repetition. Quiz yourself and review material regularly to solidify your understanding.
📖 Practice makes perfect! Write short essays or sentences to apply the grammar rules you've learned.
🌟 Stay organized and plan ahead. Use a planner to manage your study schedule and allocate specific times for grammar practice.
